snippet.title: Blood Reminds - Alpha Teaser
snippet.description:
Download the free DEMO here: https://thrustergames.itch.io/blood-reminds
🔹 https://twitter.com/ThrusterGames
🔹 https://www.instagram.com/thrustergames

------
You play as Elizabeth, a half-vampire noblewoman from the pre-Victorian era. Return to the palace that was once your home, and unfold the tragedy that took place there in your absence.

The deceased are your allies. Through their blood, you gain the ability to time-travel to their last moments and make alterations that change your present. This is the only way you can discover the truth and make it out alive…
